name: Henk and the legendary d20
description:
Help Henk on his epic quest to find the legendary d20, which always rolls a 20.

Move through the mazes by rolling exactly the right distance.

This game was made for the GMTK gamejam 2022.

Controls:

- Arrow keys to select a die and to choose a direction to walk

- Space to confirm die selection

- ESC or space again to cancel after choosing a die

There is also controller and mouse support

Credits

- Music is 'bee.' by GroovyDominoes52
